import React from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import styles from './index.module.css' import { addMovieFavorite, removeMovieFavorite } from '../../actions' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {MdFavorite} from 'react-icons/gr' export default function Card({title, id, year ,img, type}) { const dispatch = useDispatch() return (
{type === 'fav' ?
dispatch(addMovieFavorite(id))}/>
:
}

{title}

{year}

) }
